website_summaries.verdict: Nearly half the price of other top-performing toe separators for 2 pairs, and earn praise for the results they deliver.
pros: Made of resilient gel that is flexible and comfortable between the toes for most customers
Suitable for various foot ailments that cause pain
You get 2 pairs for the price
cons: and though they fit most users, may be too large for those with very small or narrow feet

customer_reviews.title: Use as intended
customer_reviews.text: As an OT, I attempted use of these for a therapeutic use (medically based) to relax tone in a stroke victim's leg, by having him wear overnight. Initially this was very successful, but within 2 nights, was uncomfortable, and I found that he was not tolerating well. Be sure that this is not used for long periods of time, but up to one hour should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: mjc

customer_reviews.title: Great Yoga Toes
customer_reviews.text: These are the first pair I have ever ordered. I have been using them every night and they are sturdy and easily washable. I am a size 11 in women and they fit my feet perfectly. My daughter wears a size 5 in women and she can wear the pair that fit between your toes (like a pedicure) but not the circle ones (they are too big). I have found that the pedicure style yoga toes actually stretch my feet more than the other style. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: SV

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! As a runner I need a way to stretch my feet. The quality of this product is right up there with more expensive brands. Having two options is also nice. Good quality and they work well. Yes, they hurt when you first start using them but that just means it's working. Start with 5 minutes and work up to 20-30. I typically use up to 45 minutes a day, especially after a long (5+ mile) run.
customer_reviews.author: Zooey G.

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: After having plantar fasciitis I was left with a Morton's neuroma between my 2nd and 3rd metatarsals. Podiatrist said I'd need a $500 orthotic. I said heck naw. I got a steroid injection, these toe separators, and a gel insert for my comfy asf sandals and that's all I've been doing for the past couple weeks in addition to light stretches and exercises. My pain has diminished greatly. I attribute most of that relief to these separators. Wearing them at night works best for me as I can sleep with them on usually. Wear every day! Still cannot curl my toes but I'm starting to get my life back.
customer_reviews.author: Amaya

customer_reviews.title: Relief!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. I've only been using them for a couple days, but have already experienced pain relief. As stroke survivor, I have spasticity in the affected limbs, left side for me. this includes toes curling under, which can get quite painful at times (one of those things they don't tell you about in post-stroke rehab). I recently happened to read acout toe stretching as potential relief for this condition. Found this product on Amazon. So far I'm loving it. It has brought relief much quicker than I expected, and I'm hopeful that it will permanently address the problem with continued long term use. I only wish I'd found it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Clueseeker

customer_reviews.title: so good! I bought these for my husband as part ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I bought these for my husband as part of his Christmas gifts, and he's absolutely loving them. He has a lot of pain in his feet (Morton's Neuroma) from working construction on his feet for the last 35 years. This eases the pain greatly for him, and each morning he's been waking up with less pain in his feet. A winner!
customer_reviews.author: Wellness Momma

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of your money. Should be called Dr. Joke
customer_reviews.text: This is the most overrated purchase I've ever made on Amazon. There is no support and the material is so soft you might as well put gummy bears between your toes. The packaging and marketing is great but when it arrives - it's a glorified pedicure tool to prevent smudged toenail polish. I work 10-12 hours days in retail/on my feet all day long. There is no way this is worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: VacationBound

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: I was getting some knee pain in the squat, and I thought it was because my a few of my toes turn towards each other, so there's unequal pressure through the foot. Purchased these separators and within 10 minutes of putting them on the knee pain was gone. I wish the material of these was slightly stiffer for more stretch, and I do prefer the piece that goes between the toes because it seems to stretch them out more. One thing I realized is that when my toes are straightened, my feet are actually wider than I thought they were, and I've been wearing incorrect shoes my whole life, which probably contributed to my toes turning in.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: nothing changed
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to wear this product with the hope it will ease my annoying bunion. But wearing it, I don't feel any change to my toes, they hardly moved or separated . This product I think is the same one used when getting a pedicure. I will return.
customer_reviews.author: shopcentric

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant because they look like the foam things you use for a pedicure, but the gel makes all the difference. I wear these while laying down, while I have others designed to be worn while in shoes. Doing some major toe realigning & stretching after 18 years in retail on my feet. I suffer from tailors bunion, a hammer toe is beginning to develop, and a bad ankle. This has actually helped loosen my stiff ankle up from an old injury!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable  but...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two sets of these one for me and one for ny husband. We both have issues with our big toes starting to bend inward and many of the reviews said that these help. We received them on a Wed afternoon and immediately put them on. We both loved the way they made our feet feel and were very excited to use them every evening to help correct our toes. Sadly within a couple of days they were coming apart on the big toe and small toe. I hope these have just been sitting around for a while and got dry rotted or something because we really liked how comfortable they are.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon F. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: these are great. Flexible and soft on the feet
customer_reviews.text: Using these while lying down so I don't know how those will do for walking/yoga. For my purposes, these are great. Flexible and soft on the feet, adjust easily and very comfortable. This is the second time I buy this product. Update: after several uses, the product started losing its color and texture. This is definitely not the same product as the first one I got. I will never purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: micbook

customer_reviews.title: Gross.
customer_reviews.text: Opened the package to find this: packaging around the item looked like it had been mauled by rats. The item itself was dirty and one of them was broken. Clearly this item was used before... thanks. For nothing—it was supposed to be a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Instant Relief
customer_reviews.text: I have a condition called Hallux Ridgidus which disallows my big toes from bending properly. Lately I'd had a lot of pain and stiffness associated with the condition, despite various exercises I do (and having tried some shoe inserts that weren't at all helpful). So I ordered this product. The first time I tried them, I got almost instant relief. I've only had them a short while, but am very happy with the product. I put them on a couple times a day when I sit to relax, and I get relief not only then, but throughout the day. Wish I'd got them sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for almost a month and I love them! These are the most durable of all the similar items I've tried. The separators are easy to insert between toes (even damaged ones). I can see the difference in just the three weeks I've been using them. So can my husband. Would definitely recommend to friends and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: M N

customer_reviews.title: Does What It's Supposed To
customer_reviews.text: I wanted toe spreaders to ease the "cramped" feeling my toes experience from being on my fee all day. Not sure if there's any real health benefits from this, but at least these separators take some of the stress off. I would imagine these would be good for helping to straighten overlapping or crooked toes, but I'm not a doctor. Also, they're soft and jelly-like for extra comfort. The picture I added shows how they came in the mail for me.
customer_reviews.author: supercyberfunk

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: Made in China. Not good for many reasons
customer_reviews.text: Only giving this one star because it’s designed in the US but MADE IN CHINA. Not good for our economy. Bring our jobs back!
customer_reviews.author: Polly026

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I could barely get this on my toes and when I did it hurt too much to keep it on. It does not work with shoes on and I couldn't sleep with it on because it would slide off my toes.
customer_reviews.author: peanuts/lucy

customer_reviews.title: Loops run large
customer_reviews.text: I did like the product however the loops toe separator was very large. It says one size fits all but it definitely won’t fit a lot of women or men with smaller feet. I am a size 7 and it was huge. My husband wore them and he is a size 11. They are definitely not one size fits all. If you are looking specifically for the loop toe separator I would double check the sizes. The other pair of toe separators were very good though!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & helps with pain
customer_reviews.text: I have severe hammer toes that are starting to overlap & cause pain . I put these on as soon as o got them NBC & they feel extremely comfortable . They relieved the pain . I know over time they will help the toe alignment . Unfortunately the bones set on my Janet toes many years ago. So I don't see them straightening. The goal Is to relieve the pain from The overlapping . I have used them about 2 hours a day & will continue to use them .
customer_reviews.author: Adri

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to clean after usage
customer_reviews.text: I have been recommending this product to my patients that need it. I have some older patients with trouble walking and I wanted to try this product with them. From just a couple of visits training the body to walk with thee toe separators I believe I was able to help them walk better and with better balance. The toe separators are great because they help spread the toes that are usually compressed.
customer_reviews.author: K Patel

customer_reviews.title: Worked amazingly! Referred by Physical Therapist
customer_reviews.text: After getting "foot drop" resulting from a surgery that went, wrong, 2 years my toes started to curl. My physical therapist recommended me getting these. I was skeptical but WOW. I've only had to wear them 3 times in the 6 months I've had them. Completely corrected the 'curl' and re-separated them. THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Gator Angel

customer_reviews.title: Not for size 10 feet
customer_reviews.text: These made my toes go numb and very painful d/t not for larger feet
customer_reviews.author: china  harrison

customer_reviews.title: These were a game changer for my ugly runner’s feet!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 1st time I have reviewed something in 3 years of having Amazon Prime. These things are LEGIT...I was in pain from running and am/was starting to develop a bunion on my left foot. I ordered these and started wearing them at home for a half hour a day. Initially, they were tough to get on and were a little painful, but in a good way. I could feel my feet stretching. Now, I put them on as soon as I get home and wear them for a couple of hours. My feet already feel so much better when I’m running!!! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: bjhayesnh

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Just dont get nailpolish remover on it!
customer_reviews.text: These work just fine, until I had them on and as I was painting my toenails, one got messed up so kept the seprators in while I used nailpolish remover to start one toe over... and quickly the gel started to break apart. Apparently I fell asleep in chemistry class! I am leaving a Star off because I dont recall there being a warning about chemical reaction.
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult to put on my feet comfortably.
customer_reviews.text: Too Painful to wear for my toes. Returned product and received timely refund .
customer_reviews.author: M K

customer_reviews.title: So soft and squishy, super comfy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use the open ones for painting my toenails and gave the closed ones to my mom who struggles with bunions. They are superrrrr soft and squishy and just sensory wise, they are super appealing. They are comfy to wear. I can walk around the house in them while my toes dry. My mom has been using the other ones daily. She also thinks they are super comfortable and they have provided her a lot of relief, as her toes are constantly hurting her. Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Craftymom80

customer_reviews.title: The toe separator works well
customer_reviews.text: The toe separator has worked very well to separate my toes with out pain. I dusted it with powder as suggested. They are soft and with practice are easy to use. I have noticed less back pain. I use them every other day for a few hours. I only wear them bare foot. And I've noticed my toes are straighter. The toe straightener is too big for my toes. I have short small toes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bunion Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: so comfy! I needed some help for pain relief since I have bunions and have a hard time finding comfy shoes (New Balance fuelcore Nergize have been the most comfortable, especially with my orthotics). I started with the inserts that look like pedicure toe separators - I have small feet so the smaller toes kept falling out. the separator with holes is perfect! I can walk around the house I'm them barefoot, they dont cause me discomfort. I've left them on for over an hour and they felt fine. Will have to see at my next appointment if they are truly helping, but I am hopeful!
customer_reviews.author: Annie B.

customer_reviews.title: both styles fit him just fine. They also fit me (size 6 female) so ...
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my boyfriends "hammertoe". He wears size 11 mens shoe, both styles fit him just fine. They also fit me (size 6 female) so they definitely fit a wide range of sizes. Make sure you read the instructions. First night he wore them all night, then looked at the instructions and it clearly says to only use them a few hours at a time. These were are great value, work great so far!
customer_reviews.author: JJW

customer_reviews.title: Good for Plantar Fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: This product does work. It is not comfortable at first. After use you will feel the stretch. Start with 20 mins and work your way up. I saw a grown man whine about the pain. But it’s stretching so of course it’s not gonna feel wonderful. I have PF and I feel that it does help.
customer_reviews.author: M Black

customer_reviews.title: the perfect relief
customer_reviews.text: I was born with flat feet and have been able to manage/live with the discomfort that comes with it. I started long boarding again and it’s difficult to board for long periods of time when my feet are killing me. Since using this, I’ve been able to stretch out my toes helping to orient and relieve some of the pain. I’m excited to keep using this and that I can use it for pedicures, too! The product came as described and is very comfy. Definitely worth it if you’ve tried everything to ease your food pain.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Finley

customer_reviews.title: Just what the Dr. ordered
customer_reviews.text: Had to laugh the first time I saw toe separators but after logging 100 of miles running my toes started to bunch together and the pinky toe was starting to move under the next toe over. After a few a few hours with these my toes have started to spread out like you would want for great yoga postures. I'd totally buy again and have recommended them to friends
customer_reviews.author: p.m.

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered!
customer_reviews.text: Like most women, the use of heels and tight toe shoes has done damage and has been unforgiving. These reverse the affect and alleviate so much ache in the toe/ball area. I have had surgery for bunions on one foot and I still get pain - these push out just far enough to fix that. They are great for separating to polish as well. I am going to try them in an Epsom salt soak and see if it gets any better! Yes - I would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Items For Great Price
customer_reviews.text: a bit difficult to get between your toes but that said - I absolutely love the product. It has helped already within the last few days of me using it my feet no longer are in the pain they were before. I am on my feet a lot and worried about creating defects but this has helped keep my toes in line! Definitely going to keep using them until I need to reorder!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Mc

customer_reviews.title: Womens Size 6  w/ plantars faciitis and tendonitis
customer_reviews.text: Dr. JK toe spreader is sooo worth it. I wear a womens size 6 shoe and have plantars faciitis and tendonitis in both feet. I was wary of which toe spreader to buy because of my small feet. I read tons of reviews for this product and countless others before finally buying this and I couldn't be happier. I've never tried any other toe spreader, and the big toe is slightly loose, but otherwise, these fit my feet well and I would certainly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I've only tried the smaller, open set. I time for 10 minutes as I cannot go longer than that. I sure have noticed it helping in the little time I've used them. I was having trouble with my toes on my left foot after an injury and hoping this will correct them and keep them straight so I can avoid the future ruined toes that I know I will deal with because of genetics :) Love that these can be washed if needed. Yoga has also been easier.
customer_reviews.author: kphil

customer_reviews.title: My pain significantly gone down
customer_reviews.text: I recently developed a bunion and it became painful to walk, a friend told me about these, I can honestly say that since I have started using these the pain significantly gone down I use them nightly, these are very soft fit my toes perfectly I love it as the design is very feminine and modern.
customer_reviews.author: Dakesart

customer_reviews.title: consider saving your money
customer_reviews.text: ordered these because i saw a video on tik tok about them and how they’re supposed to really help your feet and i’m going to be honest i didn’t really notice a difference. i used the one pair and my boyfriend used the other and we left them on for an hour and didn’t really notice a difference. in other comments it says that these really helped them so it could help you but it did absolutely nothing for me
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Doing the trick!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to address my pinkie toe slowly growing under the toe next to it. I also have some foot pain (feels like in the bones in the middle of my feet towards the pinkie toe). I can tell a difference when I use these! And suffer in pain if I don't. I put them on when I get in bed at night while watching some tv. At first I could only wear them a short bit but I can sleep in them now. Sometimes I do or sometimes I just wear them awhile while relaxing in bed then remove them to sleep. Definitely helping!
customer_reviews.author: hammydee

customer_reviews.title: My husband is not ashamed of my feet anymore!
customer_reviews.text: After working 7 years on concrete floors, my feet were distorted and in pain. I went to a podiatrist & he created custom inserts for my shoes. However, my right big toe kept curving to the right and creating a huge bunion on my foot. When I first used these ToePals, they hurt because my toes had to be retrained. Now, they feel awesome!! I put them on easily. My feet look better - my bunion is decreasing. And my heel pain from the tendon stress has decreased significantly! I can walk again and I love it. My husband is even okay with me wearing sandals again.
customer_reviews.author: windell griffin

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I am a distance hiker and sometimes carry a heavy pack. I have done this for years and my feet are beginning to have trouble. Using these at night have really helped. What surprised me is how nice they are even though I purchased the cheaper of the ones offered. I also wasn't expecting two different types. They are soft and comfortable and have held up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: SusieW

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Material is too hard and thick. Not happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Come and See Why You Should Be On Easy Feet
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and struggle to find business professional shoes that don't irritate my bunions. Most days I come home and my feet are sore after a day of wearing tight boots and heels at work. After getting home from a long day, I lay on the couch and use the gel toe separators - it instantly alleviates my achey feet. I didn't think they would work at all, but these are pretty fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer9

customer_reviews.title: It can improve your toe deformity, away from the pain
customer_reviews.text: This product is very practical and comfortable.When you first let them, it may be a little confusing, because you don't think a little assistant can change your problems, but when I use them, you will find them very comfortable to use, at the beginning, don't wear them for a long time, it may make you uncomfortable or painful.When you get used to it and wear it for a long time, the pain goes away.Now, I wear it when I sleep, and I'll wear it again the next day. It's too early to say if it will cure toe deformities, but for now I can say for sure that it will make me feel better, less painful, and worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: Norma L Venable

customer_reviews.title: Relief at last
customer_reviews.text: Took a little bit to get used to but my feet and legs feel better than they have in years. I have been suffering from plantar fasciitis for a few years now and the pain is almost gone. I highly recommend them!!! Relief at last
customer_reviews.author: Forza Italia

customer_reviews.title: Too big for my little feet
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, but a bit too big for my small size 6W foot. I can use them for a few minutes for my first two toes, but it's too painful for my smaller toes and there's no way to adjust them. I gave the larger ones to my husband to try (he's got much bigger feet).
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Spaces toes but painful
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to judge since I just got this but it feels tight and hurts more than the original discomfort I was dealing with. I saw another comment saying they need to be broken in, so I'll do that. Uncertain how long of a leash I'll give these though. I'm a size 15 and am using the separator (not the one where your toes go through the holes). My feet are average size all considering.
customer_reviews.author: LegendJoey

customer_reviews.title: More pain than without them
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was a failure. I tried both types of toe straighteners and spacers. They caused so much discomfort that I had to take them off after a few hours. They are much too bulky to wear inside shoes and even wide box sandals. I am a physician, and I would not recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ruediger Kratz, M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Feel good
customer_reviews.text: Nice there is two kinds of stretchers, and the ones open on one side are easy to slip on. I found them better and quicker to work with than bigger ones I had previously ordered from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: One pair is great, the other not so great.
customer_reviews.text: I like these for the most part. There are two pairs. The pair that wraps all the way around your toes is uncomfortable for me. The other pair that operates like a pedicure gel is comfortable and helps pain. I have large bunions and it helps move my big toe over which brings me relief.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Link

customer_reviews.title: Not Dr Approved
customer_reviews.text: Tried using this while waiting for podiatric appointment date, showed them to the doctor and he said such things were useless. I guess you can use them for a pedi.
customer_reviews.author: midyette1

customer_reviews.title: Decent!
customer_reviews.text: These are decent little contraptions. I have been using them for about three weeks, and I haven't noticed any overall effect but they feel good while I'm wearing them. I like the "ring" version between than the toe separators, but those are useful for when I paint my toenails so win-win.
customer_reviews.author: LindsayRoseEliz

customer_reviews.title: Soft, flexible, and work
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and soft and both work really well and will stay on your feet during the night. My big toe bends at the tip. I like these better than other toe separators. Other toe separators I've tried seperate down at the base of the toes which only pushes the tip of my already inward rotated toe tip further towards my other toe.
customer_reviews.author: dmh1218

customer_reviews.title: Thank you so much for such a great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been enjoying this product. I had surgery on my feet and my toes didn't heel straight on one foot and on the other foot the large toe is spaced to far from the others. These have helped me greatly reduce the pain and I am hopeful that these will help straighten my toes and space them correctly over time. .
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: So glad I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the non enclosed separator as my feet are huge and the complete wrap is uncomfortable. Plus it doesn't seem/ feel like it's spreading my toes as much as the open spreader. It's a comfortable gel that I can wear for an hour+ with toe socks or without. I can already start to see a difference in my hammer toe between these and my toe CARs
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: No More Pain!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love them!!!! Very comfortable, super soft and they do incredible job adjusting the toes. I used to wake up at night due to a pain in my feet, Not Anymore!!!! I also got toe separators from Dr.JK and I wear them in my shoes. They are so comfortable I forget that they are there:) I truly wish I discovered your products earlier, it would save me from pain. I am telling all my girlfriends about the toe stretchers and toe separators, now everyone is wearing them along with comfy shoes. It is a movement, I swear:) Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lidia Kupiec

customer_reviews.title: The 2-pack is a great deal. I use the open-top separate for painting ...
customer_reviews.text: The 2-pack is a great deal. I use the open-top separate for painting my toenails, and I use the closed-top, brass-knuckles looking one to separate and relax my toes and feet after a long day at work. I naturally have flexible toes, so I don't feel much of a stretch, nor any discomfort, but it realigns and relaxes my feet and has eliminated the toe cramps I would sometimes get at night.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Second best rated for a reason...............
customer_reviews.text: Does not separate toes or apply pressure as much as other products
customer_reviews.author: Wild Blue Yonder

customer_reviews.title: Easy to walk around in. I do not regret purchasing!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They stretch you in a way you never knew you wanted! Not overly aggressive, but a sure sensation that something is happening. I was unsure of the amount of gimmick I was getting into with them, but I works totally buy again if I lost or damaged these, I wear up to an hour at a time, and putter around or relax on the couch. Great for pedicures, too! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: lerachele

customer_reviews.title: Give my toes a workout!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only been wearing these for a few days, whenever I have time around the house. They really give my toes a workout! I don’t really have pain in my feet but I have lack of movement from wearing high heels for so many years so I’m hoping to correct that. Hopeful these will do the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen K Stout

customer_reviews.title: Gentle stretch
customer_reviews.text: Other toe separators I've used cause aching after a short while. These are comfortable over an extended time.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: extra toe separators included
customer_reviews.text: I like the toe separators even better than the "yoga toes", easier to use and more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: midcarol1

customer_reviews.title: Nice pedicure tools
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a relaxing spa experience, and really enjoy them. They are nicer than the ones that come in a salon, are made from good material, and are really useful so I don't smudge the nail polish on my toes! They are a jelly like consistency and I personally really like them because they come with 2 different size/style.
customer_reviews.author: Gray

customer_reviews.title: Toe Dividers
customer_reviews.text: I think that they really do work. When I lie down in the middle of the day out of energy in a cool room my toes and feet decide that they want to cramp up and my hammer toes start hammerin'. I put the little blue things on and they make all that go away. Also noticing it seems to be correcting this issue as I don't have as many problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works as described, a good toe stretch!
customer_reviews.text: i like the toe stretcher ones better than the loops, they give a nice stretch. they are fairly comfortable to walk in (if its just around the house) & i dont have a problem putting socks on over them. i wear them a couple hours a day, hoping to keep my bunions from getting worse.
customer_reviews.author: 3eth

customer_reviews.title: Best Toe Separators I've Tried
customer_reviews.text: These are soft and easy to put on and wash. The large ones are easier for me to wear overnight. I like the small ones but can't wear them all night yet. Have only had them for a short time. I'll get used to the little ones too.
customer_reviews.author: S. Burleson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have some toe and toe joint discomfort particularly when barefooted much more than when wearing shoes. Came across ToePal to investigate if they would help. The day they came in mail I put them on. I now wear them whenever I am home. They are quite comfortable and ease the pain and discomfort. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Paul

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL
customer_reviews.text: This product was a game-changer. Felt relief after just one and it improved my condition by about 50% in just a week. I spoke to my podiatrist about it and he told me to continue using it and I didn’t need an injection.
customer_reviews.author: RKMurphy

customer_reviews.title: No more toe cramping from my flit flops! Yay!
customer_reviews.text: I wear flip flops every single day, these really help to separate the toes & stop the foot cramps! The longer I use them I actually think I like the one that cover the toes, for some reason they are more comfortable, maybe its b/c the others tend to come out of position when I walk around the house? I'm happy with these, I got them to help w/ the toe cramps & they do work!
customer_reviews.author: Mdnelson

customer_reviews.title: Works for pain and painting toe nails
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable. Easy to slide on. Relieved pressure from my bunion after 2 days. Also works for painting toe nails while relieving pain. Easy to clean. I’m sensitive to things between toes but had no problem with these. Very squishy and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Lynn Vance

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I think these are decent for less expensive toe separators. I have also seen a difference in my toes since wearing them!!!
customer_reviews.author: MilanzMommy2013

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the toe separators were too big and wide for my size 6 foot with small toes. Customer service tried their best to find me another suitable alternative and failing so they refunded the money promptly.
customer_reviews.author: SGG

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought to help get some space between toes and on a whim during the pandemic because why not. It feels like a medical-grade rubber and thickness (better than expected). Would purchase for girlfriend or mother or anyone looking for some toes. Not sure about pain relief as listed for the product as that is not why I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: SRusso

customer_reviews.title: I have Cojoined toes and this still works for me
customer_reviews.text: I have Cojoined toes and this is also coming from a size 15 shoe and still works well with my feet. It's definitely been able to make my toes feel better with each use. Highly recommended as well as for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Prunty

customer_reviews.title: These are a bit big for my feet.
customer_reviews.text: I do like these for walking around and working in the home but they are a bit bulky and somewhat oversized for my feet. May fit men slightly better. However they do what they are supposed to - they help align your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Fulfills the purpose without a doubt
customer_reviews.text: The option of the two products is great! I purchased because I started "feeling" what is called a tailor's bunion (at the end of the little toe). The toe stretcher is smaller in size than I had previously from another company which I like better. It is more flexible, comfortable and easier to put on the toes.
customer_reviews.author: mshep

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and I'm definitely seeing correction. My toes are becoming straighter, especially my pinky toe! For the longest, I was kind of walking on it, making the shape ultimately weird but now I really feel good about it. Hurts a bit after a while, but, as I see if, so do braces. It really helps
customer_reviews.author: Yusuf Dyse

customer_reviews.title: A must have for night cramps.
customer_reviews.text: Using the product for relief of calf cramping during sleep, and a shot of yellow mustard, WOW! I went from waking up from excruciating pain as if Hades was hooked into my legs trying to drag me down into the brimstone to manageable discomfort. Whenever I have a miserable night, I kill some mustard, attach the toe spreaders, and wait for sleep to resume. Impossible to do without.
customer_reviews.author: Razor

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced but effective
customer_reviews.text: They work as described. Too expensive for gel like material. You can maximize foot correction using these in combination with a quality bunion splint, physical therapy band exercises and stability (wobble) cushion. At the end of the day, the high cost is but the result makes them a good investment. The quality is lasting.
customer_reviews.author: KMVT

customer_reviews.title: They do the job!
customer_reviews.text: They do the trick! They kind of hurt my toes, but I don't think it's the product, I think my toes just aren't used to it. Took one star down cause they seem a bit flimsy. However, I'd recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Indeed
customer_reviews.text: I have twisted toes and I’ve never really taken care of their structure, until a pain started to arise few weeks ago. I saw this product on Amazon but was reluctant at first, but personally it really helped a lot with improving my toe pain. Might as well help me in improving my natural tow structure. Material seems to be smooth silicone jelly type. Worth a try for people with messed up toes.
customer_reviews.author: Fawad Khan

customer_reviews.title: Toe separators- nope
customer_reviews.text: These are not a good option. The fit is bad. They don’t do anything. If you need a pair for a pedicure. They might work. However you could get the same thing much easier elsewhere. Skip this brand
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Relief/Bunions
customer_reviews.text: My mother suffers from hammer toes and bunions. Both get relief from using these items. I bought two packages so she could use them when she sat down for the day, either in front of the tv or her room/computer. She has thanked me repeatedly, and recommends them to others. Relief may not be permanent, but it's enough to breathe a good sigh of relief.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: perfect for relaxing after a long day at work
customer_reviews.text: i use these toe separators to relax after a long day of standing and walking at work. cooling it in the fridge prior to use proves to be very useful as it helps ease the swelling of my feet. it is easy to clean and durable too.
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: Best toe separators I've owned
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They are super soft and comfortable. They work great. I use them to help where I have a bunion. I caught my wife using them when she was painting her toes. They have multiple uses and are so soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dean M Rayburn

customer_reviews.title: Uniquely useful
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure if this was going to be a wasteful impulse buy or not, but I actually use both the separators and the pedicure separators. Actually I think I’ll put them on now.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Helps restless leg!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I know this might sound strange but I always sort of crave the feeling of my toes separated. Maybe because it instantly helps my foot pain? Weirdly enough it helps my restless leg syndrome as well. I wear them before bed and it helps so much! Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan L

customer_reviews.title: Definetly feel the stretch
customer_reviews.text: I have tried noth the toe seperstor and the yogi set. My luck since I have arthritis in my toes has been with the stretcher. So far I have not been able to use the yoga set. Hopefully down the road I can. I can feel the stretch and will revaluate and update in a month or so my review if I see improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these along with the Yogabody Toe Spreaders. I like these. They're a little more bulky but they do as they say. The set with the open loops also work for pedicures and applying polish. They are easy to care for and provide great instructions on their website for use. I wear these around the house with no shoes on to give them a chance to work and so far I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: allaboutcats

customer_reviews.title: Works!!
customer_reviews.text: These offer so much relief for bunions and crowded hammertoes. Very soothing to wear for maybe 30 minutes at a time in the evening. I noticed a difference after just a few days.
customer_reviews.author: E. C.

customer_reviews.title: I use these with my daughter when we're having a ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these with my daughter when we're having a "spa day." They work perfectly to keep her little toes separated while I paint them. I know that isn't what they're really for, but man does it work well! I wish I had thought to purchase these a long time ago!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Glover

customer_reviews.title: Works for larger feet!
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled with this product! My husband has large feet and toes and the softness of the gel allowed him to use these toe separators when others did not work. After just 3 days use, he says the pain has decreased tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Zelenik

customer_reviews.title: very soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love the toe stretcher kit. The gel is very pliable and soft, no hard edges. It relaxes my toes and I can feel the stretch on my little toe. My little toe has started to go behind my second toe instead of next to it and I think the toe stretcher is going to help with that. Also, I love that there are two separate pieces. I gave one to my husband and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Therapy
customer_reviews.text: Never in my life did I see myself wearing these for my feet, until I seen a video on how our toes can get stiff if we don’t stretch them and this is the perfect product to stretch them and prevent bunions
customer_reviews.author: Rafa Lopez

customer_reviews.title: If you’re in pain, buy these right now!
customer_reviews.text: Only my second day wearing these but it totally eliminates my Morton's neuroma pain while I’m wearing them. I can walk barefoot on my hardwood floors and not want to scream in pain. 10/10 highly recommend. I’m on my feet all day at work and I look forward to putting these on as soon as I get home.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: They are cute, good material and keep my toes separated!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to keep clean...
customer_reviews.text: Easy stretching of my feet and toes...helping them stay flexible. I'd like some that are slightly larger for my husband's big feet (man) size . I think they would increase his foot comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Carmen Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Dont purchase
customer_reviews.text: No poor product. Very disappointed. Doesnt stand up to description.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth d gregory

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! I have a broken toe that I let heal on its own. Unfortunately it is now starting to overlap toe beside. This provides great relief for immediate discomfort and I am hoping will help straighten toe some in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal S

product_meta.title: DR JK Original ToePal, Toe Separators and Toe Streightener for Relaxing Toes, Bunion Relief, Hammer Toe and More for Women and Men
product_meta.description: ToePal is an Orthotic device for improving Your Toes Health Loops Toe Separators ToePal Position the gels close to your toes joints and do not push them to the bottom of the toes. Use bare foot as shown in the picture. With the DR JK toe separators you can get relief from aching, throbbing feet and get on with your day. Constructed out of a proprietary medical-grade gel, the stretchers separate and lengthen the toes, greatly reducing strain on the joints, muscles and other tissues throughout the foot. The one-size-fits all spreaders simply slip on and instantly begin to provide relief by improving the alignment of each and every toe. Perfect for ballet dancers, yogis and athletes. Do not wear for a long time without a break and take off the gels for few hours in case of interruption of blood circulation or any other irritation. Toe Spacer gel ToePal This item is similar to the quintuple loops gels, but it is more flexible and has smoother texture. It hugs your toes and keep them in an aligned position. Can help for pedicure too. It is researched back, and all the toe separators, Toe pain relief, Toe Spacers, gel toe protectors, toe straightener, Toe Alignment, Big Toe Protector, Bunion Sleeve, Bunion Support, Bunion Stretcher, Hallux Valgus, Bunion Cushions, Toe spreader, Night splint, Ball of foot pads, Prostate Massagers, Bunion Regulator, Metatarsal Pads are scientifically proven to cause pain relief.
feature_bullets: 2 Pairs of ToePals: a Pair of Loops Toe Separators and a Pair of Gel Toe Stretchers for Yoga
Loops Toe Separators and Toe Spacers Gel Increase Spaces for Proper Toes Alignment CHANEL
Toe Straightener is great for Bunion, Hallux Valgus, Bunionette, Hammer Toes, Claw Toes
Toe Separators and Toe stretchers made from stretchable and soft medical grade gel
Great For Unsightly Foot Problems! One Size Fits Most Feet.CHANEL
